Q&A.Charging: USB Type C. 25W wired, 15W wireless, 4.5W reverse wireless
Q&A.Water Resistance: Yes, IPX8 water resistant up to 1.5m for 30 minutes
Q&A.Dmiensions: Unfolded: 154.9 x 129.9 x 6.1 mm, Folded: 154.9 x 67.1 x 13.4 mm
Q&A.Color: Icy Blue, Phantom Black, Cream, Gray, Blue
Q&A.Glass: Gorilla glass Victus 2 for folded front and back. It supports a plastic front shield when unfolded
Q&A.SIM Card: Nano-SIM or eSIM support. It does support dual SIM
Q&A.S Pen: No, but does support the use of an S pen sold separately
Q&A.Camera: Main Camera: 50MP wide angle, 10MP telephoto, 12MP ultrawide. Selfie Camera: 4MP wide angle, 10MP wide angle
